channel.title: LATEX on My Stats
channel.description: Recent content in LATEX on My Stats

item.title: Draw a flower with XY-pic package in LATEX
item.description: Recently, I found that XY-pic package can draw complex diagrams in LATEX. It allows users to design the diagram and draw as in a matrix. So a diagram is sliced implicitly as a matrix, where each entry is an element of this matrix. It becomes easy to draw a diagram based on positions. I saw a flower pattern on the tissues that I use everyday. So I drew this flower:
